title: Gabe Faces Ignorance
description: When Gabe unintentionally hurts his friend Sofia, he has no idea what he did wrong. It turns out he doesn't know everything about her, and that his actions have unforeseen consequences. Sofia cleverly directs a conversation they have with her dad to lead Gabe toward a new understanding of their relationship and of his role in promoting bias.
author: L.I. Forsete
